body_html:
I think you had the right settings at first but maybe haven't included the CUDA/cuDNN DLLs directory in your %PATH%, like a bad installation.
You should try to install TensorFlow 1.3/1.4 with GPU support, unless for an specific reason you need the older version, along with cuDNN 6.x like before but making sure both CUDA and cuDNN directories are present in your %PATH%. Could you try it and follow up?
body_text:
I think you had the right settings at first but maybe haven't included the CUDA/cuDNN DLLs directory in your %PATH%, like a bad installation.
You should try to install TensorFlow 1.3/1.4 with GPU support, unless for an specific reason you need the older version, along with cuDNN 6.x like before but making sure both CUDA and cuDNN directories are present in your %PATH%. Could you try it and follow up?
body:
I think you had the right settings at first but maybe haven't included the CUDA/cuDNN DLLs directory in your `%PATH%`, like a bad installation. 
You should try to install TensorFlow 1.3/1.4 with GPU support, unless for an specific reason you need the older version, along with cuDNN 6.x like before but making sure both CUDA and cuDNN directories are present in your `%PATH%`. Could you try it and follow up?
